overview:
Web developer freelance, Uk based, I enjoy creating for the web everyday.

Recently I crafted www.tweetcetera.com, a Twitter web client on steroid.

I also have some spare projects like www.serialcooking.com, a food blog which is going to be transformed into a food bloger promotion website.
